casebody.data:
LANDOVER HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC.
v.
SANDERS, et al. No. 13P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 15, 2016. Nelson G. Harris, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Landover Homeowners Association, Inc. Matthew D. Quinn, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Sanders, Thomas B., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of January 2016 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of January 2016."
